00030 #define TEST_CASE_SINGLE_KNOWLEDGE 0
00031 
00033 #define TEST_CASE_MULTI_KNOWLEDGE 1

00036 #define TEST_CASE_MULTI_SYS_DICT 2

00039 #define TEST_CASE_NUM TEST_CASE_SINGLE_KNOWLEDGE

00049 const int SYS_DICT_NUM = 3;
00050 const char* INPUT_FILE_NAMES[SYS_DICT_NUM] = {"asahi_test_raw_eucjp.txt", "asahi_test_raw_sjis.txt", "asahi_test_raw_utf8.txt"};
00051 const char* SYS_DICT_NAMES[SYS_DICT_NUM] = {"bin_eucjp", "bin_sjis", "bin_utf8"};
00052 #endif

00054 using namespace std;
00055 using namespace jma;
00056 
00057 class AnalyzerThread : public MeCab::thread {
00058 public:
00059     unsigned int id_;
00060     string input_;
00061     string output_;
00062     Analyzer* analyzer_;
00063     Knowledge* knowledge_;
00064 
00065     AnalyzerThread() : id_(-1), analyzer_(0), knowledge_(0) { }
00066 
00067     ~AnalyzerThread() {
00068         delete analyzer_;
00069 #if TEST_CASE_NUM != TEST_CASE_SINGLE_KNOWLEDGE
00070         delete knowledge_;
00071 #endif
00072     }
00073 
00074     void run() {
00075         ostringstream ss;
00076         ss << id_;
00077         string source = input_;
00078         string dest = createFilePath(output_.c_str(), (getFileName(input_) +  ".thread-" + ss.str()).c_str());
00079 
00080         cerr << "########## Thread No." << id_ << " => test method runWithStream()" << endl;
00081         cerr << "##### input file: " << source << endl;
00082         cerr << "##### output file: " << dest << endl;
00083 
00084 
00085         int result = analyzer_->runWithStream(source.c_str(), dest.c_str());
00086         cerr << "Thread No." << id_ << "=> " << (result == 1 ? "succeeded" : "failed") << endl;
00087     }
00088 };
00089 
00093 void printUsage()
00094 {
00095     cerr << "Usages:\t input_file output_dir [--dict DICT_PATH] [--num THREAD_NUM]" << endl;
00096     cerr << "the output of each thread would be output_dir/input_file.thread-*." << endl;
00097 }

00102 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00103 {
00104     cerr << "Japanese Morphological Analyzer Multi-Thread Test"<< endl;
00105 
00106     if(argc < 3)
00107     {
00108         printUsage();
00109         exit(1);
00110     }
00111 
00112     // file name of input and output
00113     string input = argv[1];
00114     string output = argv[2];
00115 
00116     // default config
00117     string dictPath = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00118     unsigned int threadNum = 50;
00119     for(int optIndex=3; optIndex+1<argc; optIndex+=2)
00120     {
00121         if(! strcmp(argv[optIndex], "--num"))
00122             threadNum = atoi(argv[optIndex+1]);
00123         else if(! strcmp(argv[optIndex], "--dict"))
00124             dictPath = argv[optIndex+1];
00125         else
00126         {
00127             cerr << "unknown option: " << argv[optIndex] << endl;
00128             printUsage();
00129             exit(1);
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00133     // create instances
00134     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00135 
00136     // create instances
00137 #if TEST_CASE_NUM == TEST_CASE_SINGLE_KNOWLEDGE
00138     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00139     knowledge->setSystemDict(dictPath.c_str());
00140 #if TEST_USER_DICT
00141     const char* userdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT;
00142     knowledge->addUserDict(userdict, Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8);
00143     cout << "user dictionary: " << userdict << endl;
00144 #endif
00145     if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00146     {
00147         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files "<< dictPath << endl;
00148         exit(1);
00149     }
00150     cout << "system dictionary: "<< dictPath << endl;
00151     cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00152 #endif
00153 
00154     // create multi threads
00155     vector<AnalyzerThread> threadVec(threadNum);
00156     for(unsigned int i=0; i<threadNum; ++i)
00157     {
00158         threadVec[i].id_ = i;
00159         threadVec[i].analyzer_ = factory->createAnalyzer();
00160         threadVec[i].input_ = input;
00161         threadVec[i].output_ = output;
00162 
00163 #if TEST_CASE_NUM != TEST_CASE_SINGLE_KNOWLEDGE
00164         string newDict = dictPath;
00165 #endif
00166 
00167 #if TEST_CASE_NUM == TEST_CASE_MULTI_SYS_DICT
00168         threadVec[i].input_ = createFilePath(getDirPath(input).c_str(), INPUT_FILE_NAMES[i % SYS_DICT_NUM]);
00169         newDict += "/../";
00170         newDict += SYS_DICT_NAMES[i % SYS_DICT_NUM];
00171 #endif
00172 
00173 #if TEST_CASE_NUM != TEST_CASE_SINGLE_KNOWLEDGE
00174         Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00175         knowledge->setSystemDict(newDict.c_str());
00176 #if TEST_USER_DICT
00177         const char* userdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT;
00178         knowledge->addUserDict(userdict, Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8);
00179         cout << "user dictionary: " << userdict << endl;
00180 #endif
00181         if(knowledge->loadDict() == 0)
00182         {
00183             cerr << "fail to load dictionary files "<< newDict << endl;
00184             exit(1);
00185         }
00186         cout << "system dictionary: "<< newDict << endl;
00187         cout << "encoding type of system dictionary: " << Knowledge::encodeStr(knowledge->getEncodeType()) << endl;
00188 #endif
00189 
00190         threadVec[i].knowledge_ = knowledge;
00191         if(threadVec[i].analyzer_->setKnowledge(knowledge) == 0)
00192         {
00193             cerr << "fail to set knowledge" << endl;
00194             exit(1);
00195         }
00196     }
00197 
00198     // run
00199     for(unsigned int i=0; i<threadNum; ++i)
00200         threadVec[i].start();
00201 
00202     // wait for end
00203     for(unsigned int i=0; i<threadNum; ++i)
00204         threadVec[i].join();
00205 
00206 #if PAUSE_BEFORE_DESTROY
00207     char ch;
00208 #endif
00209 
00210 #if TEST_CASE_NUM == TEST_CASE_SINGLE_KNOWLEDGE
00211 #if PAUSE_BEFORE_DESTROY
00212     cout << "before destroy single knowledge..." << endl;
00213     cin >> ch;
00214 #endif
00215     delete knowledge;
00216 #endif
00217 
00218 #if PAUSE_BEFORE_DESTROY
00219     cout << "before destroy all analyzers..." << endl;
00220     cin >> ch;
00221     threadVec.clear();
00222 
00223     cout << "wait for input to quit test case " << TEST_CASE_NUM << "..." << endl;
00224     cin >> ch;
00225 #endif
00226     return 0;
00227 }
